title: Recommend Items for Item
description: This stage returns item-item recommendations or boost similar items for an item

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

collection.title: Recommendation Collection
collection.description: If left blank, the default recommendation collection for the collection being queried will be used.

resultsLocation.title: Results Location
resultsLocation.description: If As Response is chosen, then the result of the RPC call will be the one and only response.  In all other cases, the stage will put the response from the REST/RPC call into the target location using the resultsKey.

modelIdField.title: Model ID Field
modelIdField.description: the name of the field in the recommendation collection where model ID is stored

scaleRange.title: Scale Boosts
scaleRange.description: Scale the boost values to a [min,max] range

scaleMin.title: Minimum value of the scale range

scaleMax.title: Maximum value of the scale range

foldInUpdates.title: Estimate Recent Results
foldInUpdates.description: Update recommendations based on user activity that has happened since the last recommendation job run

boostFieldName.title: Boost Field
boostFieldName.description: The field name to boost the values on.

boostingMethod.title: Boost Method
boostingMethod.description: The boost method to use. query-parser should be chosen if defType!=edismax for main query.

boostingParam.title: Boost Param
boostingParam.description: â€™Boost' multiplies scores by the boost values whereas 'bq' adds optional clauses to main query.

itemIdParam.title: Item ID Request Parameter
itemIdParam.description: The name of the request parameter containing the item ID

itemIdField.title: Item ID Field
itemIdField.description: the name of the field in the recommendation collection where user ID is stored

otherItemIdField.title: Recommended item ID Field
otherItemIdField.description: the name of the field in the recommendation collection where similar item recommendation is stored

similarityScoreField.title: Similarity Score Field
similarityScoreField.description: the name of the field in the recommendation collection where item similarity is stored
